home.loginToCreate: Log in to create and manage boards

settings.title: Workspace & account settings
settings.subtitle: A structured settings hub is ready. Each section is split so we can connect real APIs incrementally.
settings.authRequiredDescription: Settings contain account, notification, and security options that require authentication.
settings.planDescription: This page is scaffolded around the settings domains we will need most in a collaboration product.

account.title: Profile & account
account.description: Identity and public profile settings shown across boards and collaboration features.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Personal UI defaults such as language, timezone, and how boards are displayed.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Control how board activity, mentions, and reminders are delivered.

security.title: Security
security.description: Password, sessions, and account protection settings.

data.title: Data & integrations
data.description: Export, API access, and future third-party integrations.

danger.title: Danger zone
danger.description: High-impact account actions that require extra confirmation.

profile.label: Display profile
profile.description: Name, nickname, and profile information used in collaboration UI.

email.label: Email address
email.description: Primary email used for login and account recovery.

avatar.label: Profile photo
avatar.description: Upload a custom avatar for boards, comments, and presence.

language.label: Language
language.description: Primary UI language for navigation and page content.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Used for schedules, reminders, and time display consistency.

startPage.label: Start page
startPage.description: Choose which page opens first after login.

boardDensity.label: Board density
boardDensity.description: Default spacing and density for board/card layouts.

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.description: Alerts when someone mentions you in cards or board activity.

boardActivity.label: Board activity
boardActivity.description: Updates for assignments, movements, and status changes.

reminders.label: Reminders
reminders.description: Due date and scheduled event reminder preferences.

password.label: Password
password.description: Change password and define password policy hints for the account.

sessions.label: Sessions & devices
sessions.description: Review active sessions and revoke access from other devices.

twoFactor.label: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.description: Add a second step to protect your account login.

export.label: Export data
export.description: Export boards, cards, and account-related data.

integrations.label: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect calendar, chat, or automation tools later.

apiTokens.label: API tokens
apiTokens.description: Manage personal tokens for integrations and automation.

logoutAll.label: Log out all devices
logoutAll.description: Terminate sessions on every device except the current flow after confirmation.

deleteAccount.label: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and associated data after a secure confirmation flow.

implementationNotes.title: What to wire next
implementationNotes.profile: Profile editing needs a user update endpoint and avatar upload flow.
implementationNotes.notifications: Notification preferences need persisted user-level settings.
implementationNotes.security: Session/device management can reuse token/session infrastructure.
implementationNotes.data: Export and deletion require async jobs plus audit-safe confirmations.

profileEditor.title: Edit profile
profileEditor.description: Update the identity information shown to collaborators across boards and activity.
profileEditor.help: Email is read-only for now. We can add a separate verified email change flow later.

notificationCenter.title: Notification channels & reminder settings
notificationCenter.description: Control which channels receive schedule completion follow-up reminders and when they are sent. Email/browser push are ready to use, and Slack works as an MVP with a bot token + channel ID.

test.title: Send a test notification
test.description: Immediately send a test reminder using your saved completion follow-up settings (channels and delay).

overdue.title: Overdue completion follow-up reminder
overdue.description: Notify assignees when a schedule is still not completed after a delay from its end time.
overdue.previewValue: Send a reminder if still not completed {minutes} minutes after end time

summary.title: Current status
summary.note: Saved settings are persisted to your account. Local browser storage is kept as a fallback draft when the API save fails.

email.label: Email
email.description: Send reminders to the assignee email address.

slack.label: Slack
slack.description: Send reminder messages to a configured Slack channel via the Stackly bot.

webPush.label: Browser push
webPush.description: Send real-time push notifications to Chrome and other browsers.

slack.title: Slack Channel Connection (MVP)
slack.description: Requires a Slack Bot Token configured on the server. Save the target channel ID here for reminder delivery.
slack.channelIdHelp: Example: C0123456789 (or G0123456789 for private channels). Enter the channel ID, not the channel name.
slack.channelRequired: Enter a channel ID before enabling the Slack channel.

browser.title: Browser permission & subscription
browser.description: After permission is granted, run sync to register this browser as a notification target.

toast.saved: Notification settings saved to your account.
toast.failed: Failed to save notification settings. Only the local browser draft was updated.
toast.browserUnsupported: This browser does not support Web Push.
toast.permissionDismissed: Browser notification permission request was dismissed.
toast.permissionFailed: Failed to request browser notification permission.
toast.browserSynced: Browser push subscription synced to the server.
toast.browserSyncFailed: Failed to sync browser push subscription.
toast.testQueued: Test notification was queued and processed.
toast.testQueuedWithChannels: Test notification was processed for {count} channels.
toast.testFailed: Failed to send a test notification.

notificationCenter.footer: Next: Slack OAuth install/workspace linking, channel picker UI (channel list), and board/user-level routing.
